20110129082813.000|20110129082814.000|CC1|AND YOU HAVE A LITTLE KNEE      
20110129082814.000|20110129082815.000|CC1|DAMAGE, YOU HAD WORK DONE ON ONE
20110129082815.000|20110129082815.000|CC1|OF THE KNEES.                   
20110129082815.000|20110129082817.000|CC1|WHAT WAS THAT INJURY?           
20110129082817.000|20110129082818.000|CC1|>> YEAH, I HAD MICRO-FRACTURE   
20110129082818.000|20110129082819.000|CC1|MAYBE FOUR OR FIVE YEARS AGO.   
20110129082819.000|20110129082820.000|CC1|>> Dave: IS THAT LIKE A HAIRLINE
20110129082820.000|20110129082821.000|CC1|FRACTURE OR NOT AS BAD AS A     
20110129082821.000|20110129082823.000|CC1|HAIRLINE FRACTURE?

20110129082825.000|20110129082826.000|CC1|BUT YOU KNOW, I'M NOT TOO       
20110129082826.000|20110129082826.000|CC1|FAMILIAR WITH THE HAIRLINE

20110129082831.000|20110129082832.000|CC1|PRETTY SEVERE AND IT TOOK A LOT

20110129082833.000|20110129082836.000|CC1|A MICRO-FRACTURE?

20110129082839.000|20110129082839.000|CC1|TO REINVENT SOME CARTILAGE FOR  
20110129082839.000|20110129082841.000|CC1|YOU.

20110129082844.000|20110129082845.000|CC1|IN YOUR BONE AREA, TRY TO GET
